July 5, 1873 D Bury Contest
Bury Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
bury-contest

The Market, Bury Euphonium contest - winner G. Duxbury (Darwen) Prizes 1st £20 and bass valued at £16.16s. 2nd £12 and baritone valued at £11.11s. 3rd £8 and cornet valued at £10.10s. 4th £4 and side drum valued at £5. 5th £3.6th £1.
6 bands competed
